text: some further international reaction
coming into the nuclear test carried out
by North Korea a few hours ago this is
the International Atomic Energy Agency
describing it as an extremely
regrettable act they refer to the two
tests that took place last year it's the
sixth they say since 2006 in complete
disregard of the repeated demands of the
international community they refer to
recent resolutions from the Security
Council the UN reaffirming its decisions
that North Korea should not conduct any
further nuclear tests and should abandon
all nuclear weapons and existing nuclear
programs in a complete verifiable and
irreversible manner they say I strongly
urge North Korea to fully implement all
relevant resolutions of the UN Security
Council and the IAEA so an
unsurprisingly strong response from the
IAEA to events in North Korea in the
last few hours
